amendment.description: To provide funding for the Tribal Energy Loan Guarantee Program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3833 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 76 - 19. Record Vote Number: 59.

action.text: Amendment SA 3833 proposed by Senator Franken to Amendment SA 3801. (consideration: CR S2367-2368; text: CR S2367) To provide funding for the Tribal Energy Loan Guarantee Program.
